name: Magma Skeleton
pages: In the heart of a smoldering volcano or in the depths of the nether, where molten rock writhes and roars, dwells a creature of bone and fire: the Magma Skeleton, a four-armed monstrosity of immense power.

$(l)Number$(): 1-4$(br)$(l)Size$(): Medium/Large$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Scarce$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Walks$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 30hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 6hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): No$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Does not burn in sunlight.$(br)- Immune to fire.$(br)- Can wield dual weapons.
